title: This Presidents’ Day discount makes lifetime access to Windows 11 Pro only $23
content:
Macworld

If you’re considering buying a new computer because your current rig is slower than molasses, you could have an equally effective – and much cheaper – solution. Transform your older or refurbished PC with an OS upgrade from Microsoft’s latest and greatest version: Microsoft Windows 11 Pro, currently offered at under $25 through February 19 during the Presidents’ Day savings event.

Windows 11 Pro is designed with productivity-enhancing tools, like snap layouts, widgets, improved voice typing, and more. It’s user-friendly, boasting clean, rounded corners on its interface, and even comes with remote and hybrid work-friendly features like virtualization technology.

This OS is also built with innovative security features like Biometrics login, BitLocker encryption, Smart App Control, TPM 2.0, Windows Information Protection, and much more. You can easily protect your privacy and device with antivirus defenses and from unwanted tampering.

You can even embrace the future with AI capabilities, as Windows 11 Pro boasts Windows Copilot, an AI-powered assistant that replaces Cortana. It can help adjust settings, switch playlists, and summarize documents, to name a few. AI even upgrades the Windows Paint app, offering intelligent background removals, enhanced layer support, improved zooming, and more.

Score this Presidents’ Day discount on Windows 11 Pro, now just $22.97 until February 19 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.
